String.Source: Tosses a Jumping Poison spider on the ground that will launch itself at nearby enemies and explode if it lands near them.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba-laba Racun Melompat ke tanah yang akan meluncur ke musuh terdekat dan meledak bila mendarat di dekat mereka.

String.Source: Tosses a Jumping Fire spider on the ground that will launch itself at nearby enemies and explode if it lands near them.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba‑laba Api Melompat ke tanah yang akan meluncur ke arah musuh‑musuh di sekitarnya dan meledak jika mendarat di dekat mereka.

String.Source: You know what you have to do.
String.Dest: Kau tahu apa yang harus kau lakukan.

String.Source: Chance to paralyze the target for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Kesempatan untuk melumpuhkan target selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Creates an Ash Guardian that guards that location until destroyed. Consumes a heart stone from your inventory, without which it will be hostile.
String.Dest: Menciptakan Penjaga Ash yang menjaga lokasi tersebut sampai dihancurkan. Mengonsumsi batu hati dari inventori Anda; tanpa batu itu, ia akan menjadi bermusuhan.

String.Source: Creatures and people that this spider attaches to will fight for you for 30 seconds.
String.Dest: Makhluk dan orang yang dipasangi laba-laba ini akan bertarung untukmu selama 30 detik.

String.Source: Tosses a dead spider on the ground which explodes when an enemy gets too close.
String.Dest: Melempar laba-laba mati ke tanah yang meledak ketika musuh terlalu dekat.

String.Source: Uses the nearby Cruxis point to flings the caster into the air.
String.Dest: Menggunakan titik Cruxis terdekat untuk melontarkan penyihir ke udara.

String.Source: Opponents in melee range have a chance to be flung away.
String.Dest: Musuh yang berada dalam jarak dekat memiliki peluang untuk terlempar jauh.

String.Source: Targets that fail to resist are immobilized in hardened ash for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Target yang gagal melawan akan dibekukan dalam abu mengeras selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range have a chance of being flung away.
String.Dest: Selama <dur> detik, lawan dalam jarak serang memiliki peluang untuk dilempar menjauh.

String.Source: Creatures and people up to level <mag> will attack anything nearby for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Makhluk dan orang hingga level <mag> akan menyerang apa saja di sekitarnya selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes when enemies are nearby, immobilizing them in hardened ash for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Dilemparkan pada permukaan terdekat, mantra ini meledak ketika musuh berada di dekatnya, mengikat mereka dalam abu mengeras selama <dur> detik.
Buku Hitam: Legenda yang Tidak Terungkap

String.Source: A fiery explosion for <mag> points of damage in a 15 foot radius. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: Ledakan berapi dengan <mag> poin kerusakan dalam radius 15 kaki. Target yang terbakar menerima kerusakan tambahan.

String.Source: Targets up to level <20> that fail to resist are frenzied for <30> seconds.
String.Dest: Target hingga level <20> yang gagal menahan akan menjadi gila selama <30> detik.

String.Source: Creatures and people will attack enemies nearby for 10 seconds.
String.Dest: Makhluk dan orang akan menyerang musuh di sekitar selama 10 detik.

String.Source: Varona went to Raven Rock on an errand.
String.Dest: Varona pergi ke Raven Rock untuk sebuah urusan.

String.Source: Know anyone that might take the job?
String.Dest: Ada yang tahu siapa yang mungkin mau terima pekerjaan ini?

String.Source: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 20
String.Dest: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 20

String.Source: Raven Rock Crescius Caerellius's House Faction
String.Dest: Faksi Rumah Raven Rock Crescius Caerellius

String.Source: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 23
String.Dest: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 23

String.Source: I found Varona dead on the road to Raven Rock.
String.Dest: Saya menemukan Varona mati di jalan menuju Raven Rock.

String.Source: Tell Neloth that Varona is dead
String.Dest: Beritahu Neloth bahwa Varona sudah mati

String.Source: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 22
String.Dest: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 22

String.Source: Do you want to be the new steward of Tel Mithryn?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu ingin menjadi pengelola baru Tel Mithryn?

String.Source: I've found you a new steward.
String.Dest: Saya telah menemukan seorang pengurus baru untuk Anda.

String.Source: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 21
String.Dest: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 21
Buku Hitam: Legenda yang Tidak Terungkap

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
Adril and Cindiri Arano's Shared Faction
String.Dest: Faksi Bersama Adril dan Cindiri Arano

String.Source: Fethis and Dreyla Alor's Shared Faction
String.Dest: Fraksi Bersama Fethis dan Dreyla Alor

String.Source: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 19
String.Dest: The Journal of Ralis Sedarys - Volume 19
Adegan Rumah Crescius di Raven Rock 01

String.Source: Use the "Bend Will" Shout to tame Sahrotaar
String.Dest: Gunakan Shout "Bend Will" untuk menjinakkan Sahrotaar

String.Source: Wait for Storn to read the book
What can you tell me about the Harstrad headwaters?
String.Dest: Apa yang bisa kau beri tahu tentang mata air Harstrad?

String.Source: It was in Ildari Sarothril's grave.
String.Dest: Itu berada di dalam makam Ildari Sarothril.

String.Source: This heart stone is the source of the attacks.
String.Dest: Batu hati ini adalah sumber serangan.
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Pun Adegan 12

String.Source: Kill the ash spawn attacking Captain Veleth
String.Dest: Bunuh Ash Spawn yang menyerang Captain Veleth

String.Source: Find the source of the attacks

String.Dest: Adegan 06 Manor Morvayn di Raven Rock
Raven Rock Lokasi Mana Saja Adegan 11
Adegan Ayunan & Pengambilan di Raven Rock 02

String.Source: Except now he expects me to pay him.
String.Dest: Kecuali sekarang dia mengharapkan saya membayarnya.
Adegan 02 Rumah Crescius di Raven Rock
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Pun Adegan 01
Raven Rock Lokasi Mana Pun Adegan 02
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Saja Adegan 03
Raven Rock Lokasi Mana Saja Adegan 05
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Saja Adegan 10

String.Source: Aren't you coming to Highpoint Tower?
String.Dest: Bukankah kamu akan datang ke Highpoint Tower?

String.Source: Why don't you do this? Why me?
String.Dest: Kenapa kamu tidak melakukan ini? Kenapa aku?

String.Source: Tosses a dead spider on the ground which explodes when an enemy gets too close.
String.Dest: Melempar laba-laba mati ke tanah yang meledak ketika musuh terlalu dekat.
Raven Rock Lokasi Mana Pun Adegan 07

String.Source: Master Neloth? What did he do?
String.Dest: Master Neloth? Apa yang dia lakukan?
Apakah kamu berutang uang kepada Mogrul?

String.Source: I hear you know where to find Black Books.
String.Dest: Saya dengar Anda tahu di mana menemukan Black Books.

String.Source: Talvas summoned an Ash Guardian outside.
String.Dest: Talvas memanggil Penjaga Abu di luar.

String.Source: Did you know about the Ash Guardian outside?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu tahu tentang Penjaga Abu di luar?

String.Source: What went wrong with the Ash Guardian spell?
String.Dest: Apa yang tidak beres dengan mantra Ash Guardian?

String.Source: The Dwemer? What do they have to do with this?
What do you need to fix the tower?
String.Dest: Apa yang Anda butuhkan untuk memperbaiki menara?

String.Source: Caster is invisible for <dur> seconds. Activating an object or attacking will break the spell.
String.Dest: Penyihir menjadi tak terlihat selama <dur> detik. Mengaktifkan objek atau menyerang akan mematahkan mantra.

String.Source: Why don't you just pay him?
String.Dest: Kenapa kamu tidak langsung membayarnya saja?

String.Source: Creates an Ash Guardian that guards that location until destroyed. Consumes a heart stone from your inventory.
String.Dest: Menciptakan Ash Guardian yang menjaga lokasi tersebut hingga dihancurkan. Mengonsumsi batu hati dari inventaris Anda.
Di mana saya bisa mendapatkan taproot?

String.Source: Learn the hidden knowledge of "Epistolary Acumen"
I have some right here. Take it.
String.Dest: Saya punya beberapa di sini. Ambil saja.

String.Source: I have the three soaked taproots.
String.Dest: Saya memiliki tiga akar pangkal yang direndam.

String.Source: Elynea said you needed these taproots.
String.Dest: Elynea berkata kamu membutuhkan akar-akar ini.

String.Source: I have to know what Miraak knows if I want to stop him.
String.Dest: Aku harus mengetahui apa yang Miraak tahu jika aku ingin menghentikannya.

String.Source: I don't think I can help you right now.
String.Dest: Saya rasa saya tidak dapat membantu Anda saat ini.

String.Source: I'd like to book passage to Solstheim.
String.Dest: Saya ingin memesan perjalanan ke Solstheim.
Adegan Morvayn Manor di Raven Rock 01

String.Source: I can destroy it for you.
Use the "Bend Will" Shout on the Wind Stone
String.Dest: Gunakan teriakan "Bend Will" pada Wind Stone

String.Source: I found a Black Book. I need to find more.
String.Dest: Saya menemukan sebuah Buku Hitam. Saya perlu menemukan lebih banyak.
Adegan 03 Manor Morvayn di Raven Rock

String.Source: How close do I have to be?
And if I don't pay you?
There wasn't a body in the grave. Just the heart stone.
String.Dest: Tidak ada tubuh di dalam makam. Hanya batu hati.
Raven Rock Lokasi Mana Saja Adegan 04

String.Source: Does the guild know anyone here that might?
String.Dest: Apakah guild mengetahui seseorang di sini yang mungkin?

String.Source: I'm so sorry! Here, take the money.
About that money Drovas owes you...
String.Dest: Mengenai uang yang Drovas berutang padamu...

String.Source: Tosses a Flame Cloaked spider on the ground that will cause fire damage to enemies that get too close.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba-laba berselubung api ke tanah yang akan menyebabkan kerusakan api pada musuh yang terlalu dekat.
Adegan 01: Swing & Scoop di Raven Rock

String.Source: Or I could just kill you now.
String.Dest: Atau aku bisa langsung membunuhmu sekarang.
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Saja Adegan 08

String.Source: Please be patient. I'll get you your money.
String.Dest: Mohon bersabar. Aku akan memberimu uangmu.

String.Source: A cyclone that does <mag> points of damage per second and flings victims into the air.
String.Dest: Sebuah siklon yang memberikan <mag> poin kerusakan per detik dan melemparkan korban ke udara.

String.Source: Skaal Village Deor Woodcutter's House Faction
String.Dest: Skaal Desa Deor Woodcutter's House Faksi

String.Source: How do you know you are under attack?
String.Dest: Bagaimana kamu tahu bahwa kamu sedang diserang?

String.Source: I suppose you want me to kill them.
String.Dest: Saya kira kau ingin aku membunuh mereka.

String.Source: Fires a Spectral Arrow at the target doing <mag> points of damage and staggering the target.
String.Dest: Menembakkan Spectral Arrow pada target yang menyebabkan <mag> poin kerusakan dan membuat target terhuyung.

String.Source: Join the assault on Thirsk Mead Hall
String.Dest: Bergabunglah dengan serangan ke Thirsk Mead Hall

String.Source: Experiment? What did you do to her?
String.Dest: Eksperimen? Apa yang kamu lakukan padanya?

String.Source: I'm not sure the dragons are about you.
String.Dest: Saya tidak yakin Dragons berhubungan denganmu.

String.Source: Can I help with your research?
Your spell made me weaker once I got wet!
String.Dest: Mantra mu membuatku lebih lemah ketika aku basah!

String.Source: I'm looking for someone named Miraak.
String.Dest: Saya sedang mencari seseorang bernama Miraak.

String.Source: What kind of experiment do you want to do on me?
String.Dest: Eksperimen macam apa yang ingin kamu lakukan padaku?

String.Source: Have you found any other black books?
String.Dest: Apakah Anda menemukan Black Books lain?

String.Source: You said you can show me my true power.
String.Dest: Kau bilang kau bisa menunjukkan kekuatanku yang sesungguhnya.

String.Source: How do we get the book out of its case?
String.Dest: Bagaimana cara kita mengeluarkan buku dari kotaknya?

String.Source: Health is permanently lowered <mag> points after swimming or being in the rain.
String.Dest: Kesehatan berkurang permanen <mag> poin setelah berenang atau berada di dalam hujan.

String.Source: No thanks. That sounds like a bad idea.
String.Dest: Tidak, terima kasih. Itu terdengar seperti ide yang buruk.

String.Source: Storn sent me to find you.
String.Dest: Storn mengirim saya untuk menemui Anda.

String.Source: I don't need your help. I'll learn Miraak's secrets on my own.
String.Dest: Aku tidak butuh bantuanmu. Aku akan mempelajari rahasia Miraak sendiri.

String.Source: What do you want me to do?
String.Dest: Apa yang kamu ingin aku lakukan?

String.Source: He wants the "secrets of the Skaal" in exchange for teaching me the third Word.
String.Dest: Dia menginginkan "rahasia Skaal" sebagai imbalan untuk mengajarku Kata ketiga.

String.Source: Did you come here from Morrowind?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu datang ke sini dari Morrowind?

String.Source: Targets that fail to resist take <mag> points of poison damage per second for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Target yang gagal menahan akan menerima <mag> poin kerusakan racun per detik selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Summons an Ash Spawn for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
String.Dest: Memanggil Ash Spawn selama <dur> detik di mana pun penyihir mengarah.

String.Source: He must have been someone important.
I'm not really sure. I saw Miraak on a dragon.
String.Dest: Saya tidak begitu yakin. Aku melihat Miraak di atas naga.

String.Source: The swords true power can only be unlocked by the Thuum of the Dohvakiin. Rage Of Ancients Active: <Global=dlc2DBDragonWeapons>
String.Dest: Kekuatan sejati pedang hanya dapat dibuka oleh Thuum dari Dohvakiin. Rage Of Ancients Aktif: <Global=dlc2DBDragonWeapons>

String.Source: Receive an additional <mag> Health and Stamina while Bow Of The Stag Prince is equipped.
String.Dest: Menerima tambahan <mag> Kesehatan dan Stamina saat Bow Of The Stag Prince dipasang.

String.Source: This Miraak tried to have me killed.
String.Dest: Miraak ini mencoba membuat saya dibunuh.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <mag> points fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: Selama <dur> detik, musuh dalam jangkauan serangan jarak dekat menerima <mag> poin kerusakan api per detik. Target yang terbakar menerima kerusakan tambahan.

String.Source: Where can I find a Briarheart warrior?
String.Dest: Di mana saya dapat menemukan seorang pejuang Briarheart?
Skaal Rumah Wulf Wildblood di Desa

String.Source: Why do you think the attacks are from the Attius Farm?
String.Dest: Mengapa kamu berpikir serangan itu berasal dari Pertanian Attius?

String.Source: +<mag>% resistance to fire and frost for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: +<mag>% ketahanan terhadap api dan es selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: What do Briarhearts have to do with Heart Stones?
String.Dest: Apa hubungannya Briarheart dengan Heart Stones?

String.Source: What are the "secrets of the Skaal"?
Are you hurt badly? Do you need healing?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu terluka parah? Apakah kamu butuh Healing?

String.Source: I can't let you lead Thirsk.
String.Dest: Aku tidak bisa membiarkanmu memimpin Thirsk.

String.Source: The book was right where you said it would be.
String.Dest: Buku itu berada tepat di tempat yang kau katakan akan berada.

String.Source: Opponents in melee range take <mag> points poison damage per second.
String.Dest: Lawan dalam jarak melee menerima <mag> poin kerusakan racun per detik.

String.Source: Spells cost no Magicka for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: spells tidak menghabiskan Magicka selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: All spells cost <75>% less to cast for <dur> seconds. Single use, then must be reacquired at the Tree Stone.
String.Dest: Semua spells mengurangi biaya <75>% ketika digunakan selama <dur> detik. Sekali pakai, kemudian harus diambil kembali di Tree Stone.

String.Source: What do you want of me?
Can I help with your research?
I could lend you a hand... for a price.
I discovered this note on one of the ash spawn.
String.Dest: Saya menemukan catatan ini pada salah satu ash spawn.
Tanyakan kepada Deor tentang menghilangnya Baldor

String.Source: Summons a Werebear for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing. Single use, then must be reacquired at the Beast Stone.
String.Dest: Memanggil Werebear selama <dur> detik di mana pun penyihir mengarahkan. Sekali pakai, kemudian harus diperoleh kembali di Batu Binatang.

String.Source: Why don't you go on ahead.
Power attacks do <25>% more damage, +<mag> damage resistance for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Serangan kuat memberikan <25>% kerusakan lebih, +<mag> ketahanan kerusakan selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: I'd be glad to lend you a hand.
Causes <mag> points of poison damage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Menyebabkan <mag> poin kerusakan racun selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: What are you going to do now?
String.Dest: Apa yang akan kau lakukan sekarang?

String.Source: Tell me what you want, my lord, and I will bring it to you.
String.Dest: Beritahu saya apa yang Anda inginkan, Tuan, dan saya akan membawanya kepada Anda.

String.Source: You take half damage for <dur> seconds from all physical attacks and most magical attacks.
String.Dest: Anda menerima setengah kerusakan selama <dur> detik dari semua serangan fisik dan sebagian besar serangan sihir.

String.Source: That was a little more than I expected.
String.Dest: Itu sedikit lebih dari yang saya harapkan.

String.Source: No heart stones, ash guardian is uncontrolled
String.Dest: Tidak ada heart stones, ash guardian tidak terkendali

String.Source: Tosses a Poison Cloaked spider on the ground that will Poison enemies that get too close.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba-laba berbalut Racun ke tanah yang akan meracuni musuh yang terlalu mendekat.

String.Source: You were saying something about heart stones?
String.Dest: Anda tadi mengatakan sesuatu tentang batu hati?

String.Source: Caster ignores <80>% of all physical damage for <dur> seconds. Single use, then must be reacquired at the Earth Stone.
String.Dest: Penyihir mengabaikan <80>% dari semua kerusakan fisik selama <dur> detik. Sekali pakai, kemudian harus didapatkan kembali di Batu Bumi.

String.Source: How were Rieklings able to overpower you?
I think I'll pass for now.
String.Dest: Saya rasa saya akan menolak dulu.

String.Source: Search the Attius Farm for clues
What do you want of me, my lord?
String.Dest: Apa yang Anda inginkan dariku, Tuan?

String.Source: What do you want of me this time?
String.Dest: Apa yang kamu inginkan dariku kali ini?

String.Source: So what's your price for the final Word of Power?
String.Dest: Jadi, berapa harganya untuk Kata Kekuatan terakhir?

String.Source: Yes, and I've brought you the map to the Stalhrim source.
String.Dest: Ya, dan aku telah membawa Map ke Stalhrim Source.

String.Source: Get the Wind and Sand book
Restore the steam supply to the Dwemer reading room
String.Dest: Pulihkan pasokan uap ke ruang baca Dwemer

String.Source: How are you feeling about that?
Where can I find this Ancarion?
String.Dest: Di mana saya dapat menemukan Ancarion ini?

String.Source: Yes, I came here to learn Miraak's secrets.
String.Dest: Ya, saya datang ke sini untuk mempelajari rahasia Miraak.

String.Source: Somehow, reading this book took me to where he was.
String.Dest: Entah bagaimana, membaca buku ini membawaku ke tempat dia berada.

String.Source: Are you still having issues with the ash spawn?
String.Dest: Apakah Anda masih mengalami masalah dengan ash spawn?

String.Source: I found myself in another place.
String.Dest: Aku menemukan diriku di tempat lain.

String.Source: I don't know yet what he wanted. I left Apocrypha before I found out.
String.Dest: Saya belum tahu apa yang dia inginkan. Saya meninggalkan Apocrypha sebelum saya mengetahuinya.

String.Source: You suspect there's a motivation to their attacks?
String.Dest: Kau curiga ada motivasi di balik serangan mereka?

String.Source: I will do as you command, my lord.
String.Dest: Saya akan melakukan apa yang Anda perintahkan, Tuan.

String.Source: I learned the second Word of the Bend Will Shout.
String.Dest: Saya telah mempelajari Kata Kedua dari Seruan Bend Will.

String.Source: Find the source of Miraak's power
Do 10% more damage and get 10% better prices from people of the opposite sex.
String.Dest: Berikan 10% lebih banyak kerusakan dan dapatkan harga 10% lebih baik dari orang lawan jenis.

String.Source: Did anything unusual happen around the time of his disappearance?
String.Dest: Apakah ada sesuatu yang tidak biasa terjadi pada saat dia menghilang?

String.Source: What if you had one extra warrior?
String.Dest: Bagaimana jika kamu memiliki satu prajurit tambahan?

String.Source: Very well. Where do I begin?
Can I help with your research?
That sounds a little too risky.
I think you owe me for that spell.
String.Dest: Aku rasa kau berhutang padaku karena mantra itu.

String.Source: Your attacks, shouts, and destruction spells do no damage to your followers when in combat.
String.Dest: Serangan, teriakan, dan penghancuran spells Anda tidak memberikan kerusakan pada Followers Anda saat berada dalam pertempuran.

String.Source: Wielder receives an increasingly powerful blessing for every 20 animals killed by the bow. <Global=dlc2MerchAnimalsKilled> animals killed.
String.Dest: Pemegang menerima berkat yang semakin kuat untuk setiap 20 hewan yang dibunuh dengan busur. <Global=dlc2MerchAnimalsKilled> hewan terbunuh.

String.Source: What if the Skaal refuse to give up their secrets?
String.Dest: Bagaimana kalau Skaal menolak menyerahkan rahasia mereka?

String.Source: Creates a magic dagger for <dur> seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
String.Dest: Menciptakan belati sihir selama <dur> detik. Taruh di sarung untuk menghilangkannya.

String.Source: I hope you know what you're doing. (Give book)
String.Dest: Saya harap Anda tahu apa yang Anda lakukan. (Give book)

String.Source: Targets that fail to resist are coated in solidified as for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Target yang gagal menahan akan dilapisi dengan padatan selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Target moves in complete silence for <dur> seconds, with a side effect of shrinking the target.
String.Dest: Target bergerak dalam keheningan total selama <dur> detik, dengan efek samping memperkecil target.

String.Source: Release the book from the Dwemer contraption
I won't serve you, monster. I just want to defeat Miraak.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan melayani kamu, monster. Aku hanya ingin mengalahkan Miraak.

String.Source: Collect ash from an ash spawn
A gout of fire that does <mag> points per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: Semburan api yang menghasilkan <mag> poin per detik. Target yang terbakar menerima kerusakan tambahan.

String.Source: I will talk to the Skaal and bring you their secrets.
String.Dest: Saya akan berbicara dengan Skaal dan membawa rahasia mereka kepada Anda.

String.Source: Reading Skill Books gives you an extra Skill Point.
String.Dest: Membaca Skill books memberi Anda satu Poin Skill tambahan.

String.Source: How did that bring you to this old farm?
String.Dest: Bagaimana hal itu membawamu ke pertanian tua ini?

String.Source: Can I help with your research?
Seems like a waste of time to me.
String.Dest: Terasa seperti membuang waktu bagi saya.

String.Source: Can I help with your research?
Take on the form of the bear.
Glass Bow of the Stag Prince
String.Dest: Glass Bow of the Stag Prince

String.Source: Don't worry, I was just leaving.
String.Dest: Jangan khawatir, aku hanya sedang pergi.

String.Source: What did you learn from the Briarheart?
String.Dest: Apa yang kau pelajari dari Briarheart?

String.Source: You take no falling damage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Anda tidak menerima kerusakan jatuh selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Power attacks cost no Stamina for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Serangan kuat tidak menghabiskan Stamina selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Bilgemuck is an animal of some kind? And you want it back?
String.Dest: Bilgemuck itu binatang semacam apa? Dan kamu ingin mengembalikannya?

String.Source: Why haven't you acted on the information?
String.Dest: Mengapa kamu belum menindaklanjuti informasi itu?

String.Source: Adril Arano said you might be able to help me.
String.Dest: Adril Arano mengatakan Anda mungkin dapat membantu saya.

String.Source: Discover the identity of the tomb's visitor

String.Dest: Saya telah menemukan sebuah Hagraven Claw.

String.Source: Why haven't you told Adril about this?
String.Dest: Kenapa kamu belum memberitahu Adril tentang ini?

String.Source: Of course, Master Neloth. As you command.
String.Dest: Tentu saja, Master Neloth. Sesuai perintah Anda.

String.Source: Are you saying you want my help?
String.Dest: Apakah kau mengatakan kau menginginkan bantuanku?

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for and freezes the target in place for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Dilemparkan pada permukaan terdekat, ia meledak dan membekukan target di tempatnya selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: I have some things to sell.
String.Dest: Saya memiliki beberapa barang untuk dijual.

String.Source: You feel an attack on the councilor is imminent.
String.Dest: Anda merasa serangan terhadap anggota dewan akan segera terjadi.

String.Source: Bring a daedra heart to Elynea
Are you one of Neloth's apprentices?
String.Dest: Apakah kau salah satu murid Neloth?

String.Source: I've decided to help you protect Councilor Morvayn.
String.Dest: Saya telah memutuskan untuk membantu Anda melindungi Konselor Morvayn.

String.Source: Why don't you just make your own tea?
String.Dest: Kenapa tidak kamu buat tehmu sendiri saja?

String.Source: What happened to House Hlaalu as a result?
String.Dest: Apa yang terjadi pada House Hlaalu sebagai akibatnya?

String.Source: Black Book: The Winds of Change
Sprayed on the ground, it creates a wall of frost that does <50> points of frost damage per second.
String.Dest: Saat disemprotkan ke tanah, ia menciptakan dinding es yang memberikan <50> poin kerusakan es per detik.

String.Source: You're lying. You're from House Hlaalu!
String.Dest: Kau berbohong. Kau berasal dari House Hlaalu!

String.Source: Can you tell me more about the Severin family?
String.Dest: Bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya lebih banyak tentang keluarga Severin?

String.Source: I'll let you get to it then.
Black Book: The Winds of Change
What kind of a person should I look for?
String.Dest: Orang seperti apa yang harus saya cari?

String.Source: Hunter and Dog in the Wilderness
String.Dest: Pemburu dan Anjing di Alam Liar

String.Source: I presume that was their downfall.
Tell me why you're really here.
String.Dest: Katakan padaku mengapa kamu sebenarnya di sini.
Apa yang sedang terjadi di sini?

String.Source: Nothing unusual about them at all?
String.Dest: Tidak ada yang aneh tentang mereka sama sekali?
Tunggu di dalam Ulen Ancestral Tomb
Siapa lagi yang tinggal di sini?

String.Source: Bring some void salts to Elynea
String.Dest: Bawakan beberapa garam kehampaan ke Elynea
Kekuatan Tak Terbendung - Fus Ro Da

String.Source: I'd prefer not to get involved.
Bring some vampire dust to Elynea
String.Dest: Bawalah sedikit debu vampir ke Elynea

String.Source: I suspect Tilisu Severin is the culprit.
String.Dest: Saya curiga Tilisu Severin adalah pelakunya.
Apa yang kamu lakukan di sini?

String.Source: Why do Dunmer leave ash yams in their tombs?
String.Dest: Mengapa Dunmer meninggalkan umbi abu di dalam makam mereka?

String.Source: End the threat to Councilor Morvayn
I'm sorry, this is all just too strange for me.
String.Dest: Maaf, semuanya ini terlalu aneh bagi saya.

String.Source: How do I get them to do that?
Why did Councilor Morvayn execute an Ulen?
String.Dest: Mengapa Penasihat Morvayn mengeksekusi seorang Ulen?

String.Source: He ordered the execution. It's on his head... not yours.
String.Dest: Dia memerintahkan eksekusi. Itu berada di kepalanya... bukan kepalamu.

String.Source: He's in danger of being killed? How?
You can't just order me around.
String.Dest: Kau tidak bisa begitu saja memerintahku.

String.Source: What does it mean to be a member of your house?
String.Dest: Apa artinya menjadi anggota rumah Anda?

String.Source: Why would the Ulens want him dead?
Summons a Dremora merchant for <dur> seconds.

String.Dest: Apakah kamu punya ide yang lebih baik?

String.Source: I did what had to be done.
String.Dest: Aku melakukan apa yang harus dilakukan.

String.Source: How did you learn to talk?
Why don't you ask them to investigate?
String.Dest: Mengapa kamu tidak meminta mereka untuk menyelidiki?

String.Source: What can you tell me about House Hlaalu?
String.Dest: Apa yang bisa Anda ceritakan tentang House Hlaalu?

String.Source: Bring a giant's toe to Elynea
String.Dest: Bawalah sebuah Giant's Toe ke Elynea

String.Source: I saw her in the Ulen tomb.
What if they try to stop me?
Bring a hagraven's claw to Elynea

String.Dest: Saya menemukan apa yang kamu inginkan.

String.Source: You were right all along. (Give journal)
Glover wants his Ancient Nordic Pickaxe back.
String.Dest: Glover ingin Ancient Nordic Pickaxenya kembali.

String.Source: Tosses a Jumping Shock spider on the ground that will launch itself at enemies and explode if it lands near them.
String.Dest: Melempar laba-laba Shock Melompat ke tanah yang akan meluncur ke arah musuh dan meledak jika mendarat di dekat mereka.
Katakan apa saja yang kau bisa.

String.Source: Why are you telling me all of this?
Perhaps you should return to Morrowind.
String.Dest: Mungkin kau harus kembali ke Morrowind.

String.Source: What can I do to help the Skaal?
String.Dest: Apa yang bisa saya lakukan untuk membantu Skaal?

String.Source: A cyclone that does <mag> points of damage per second and may fling victims into the air.
String.Dest: Sebuah siklon yang memberikan <mag> poin kerusakan per detik dan dapat melontarkan korban ke udara.

String.Source: I admit, this does sound suspicious.
String.Dest: Saya mengakui, ini memang terdengar mencurigakan.

String.Source: Slow down here. I don't want to hurt you.
String.Dest: Slow di sini. Aku tidak ingin menyakitimu.

String.Source: What does it mean if we're both Dragonborn?
String.Dest: Apa artinya jika kita berdua adalah Dragonborn?

String.Source: I'm guessing you don't agree with Crescius's story.
String.Dest: Saya rasa Anda tidak setuju dengan cerita Crescius.

String.Source: How long have you been studying the Skaal?
String.Dest: Berapa lama Anda telah mempelajari Skaal?

String.Source: You're right. I want to be the new chief.
String.Dest: Kau benar. Aku ingin menjadi kepala baru.

String.Source: Why have such elite soldiers on this island?
String.Dest: Mengapa ada pasukan elit seperti itu di pulau ini?

String.Source: Is Master Neloth a good teacher?
String.Dest: Apakah Master Neloth guru yang baik?

String.Source: Power attacks do <25>% more damage, +<mag> damage resistance for <dur> seconds. Ancient Dragonborn are summoned if health falls below <50>%.
String.Dest: Serangan kuat memberikan <25>% kerusakan tambahan, +<mag> resistansi kerusakan selama <dur> detik. Ancient Dragonborn dipanggil jika kesehatan turun di bawah <50>%.

String.Source: But you said Redoran leads the Council.
String.Dest: Tapi kamu katakan Redoran memimpin Dewan.

String.Source: Have you always served as a ferryman?
Where did you learn your alchemy skills?
String.Dest: Dari mana kamu belajar alkimia skills?

String.Source: A cyclone that does <mag> points of damage per second and may fling victims into the air.
String.Dest: Sebuah siklon yang memberikan <mag> poin kerusakan per detik dan dapat melontarkan korban ke udara.

String.Source: What kinds of game do you hunt?
String.Dest: Jenis-jenis binatang buruan apa yang kamu buru?

String.Source: You're a priest at the Temple?
Why didn't he move somewhere else to find work?
String.Dest: Mengapa dia tidak pindah ke tempat lain untuk mencari pekerjaan?

String.Source: Is he somewhere else on Solstheim?
String.Dest: Apakah dia berada di tempat lain di Solstheim?

String.Source: Tosses a dead spider on the ground which explodes when an enemy gets too close.
String.Dest: Melempar laba-laba mati ke tanah yang meledak ketika musuh terlalu dekat.

String.Source: Council? You mean there's no Jarl?
I'm here about the Stalhrim map.
String.Dest: Saya di sini tentang Stalhrim Map.

String.Source: Miraak has absorbed the dragon soul!
It sounds like quite a sight.
String.Dest: Kedengarannya seperti pemandangan yang luar biasa.

String.Source: Your inn has an unusual name.
String.Dest: Penginapanmu memiliki nama yang tidak biasa.

String.Source: Are sales that bad out here?
String.Dest: Apakah penjualannya begitu buruk di sini?

String.Source: What exactly do you sell here?
String.Dest: Apa sebenarnya yang kamu jual di sini?

String.Source: Tosses a Shock Cloaked spider on the ground that will apply Shock Damage to enemies that get too close.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba-laba berbalut Kejut ke tanah yang akan memberikan Kerusakan Kejut pada musuh yang terlalu mendekat.

String.Source: You worry much on your husband's behalf.
Can you train me in Conjuration?
String.Dest: Bisakah Anda melatih saya dalam Conjuration?

String.Source: That's not enough. I need to stop Miraak now.
String.Dest: Itu tidak cukup. Aku harus menghentikan Miraak sekarang.

String.Source: What sort of a secret would be hidden here?
String.Dest: Rahasia macam apa yang tersembunyi di sini?

String.Source: Who or what is the All-Maker?
Creatures and people up to level <mag> won't fight for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Makhluk dan orang hingga level <mag> tidak akan bertarung selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Which is it? Yes or no?
The smith said he'd teach me how to make Stalhrim weapons.
String.Dest: Pandai besi itu berkata bahwa dia akan mengajarku cara membuat senjata Stalhrim.

String.Source: Do you know him or not?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu kenal dia atau tidak?

String.Source: What do we need to do now?
String.Dest: Apa yang harus kita lakukan sekarang?

String.Source: The blacksmith won't talk. You're wasting your time (Persuade)
String.Dest: Pandai besi tidak mau bicara. Kamu membuang waktu (Persuade)

String.Source: How did you end up in Raven Rock?
String.Dest: Bagaimana Anda berakhir di Raven Rock?

String.Source: What did you do in Skyrim, before you came back here?
String.Dest: Apa yang kamu lakukan di Skyrim, sebelum kamu kembali ke sini?

String.Source: Can you tell me anything about him?
String.Dest: Bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya sesuatu tentang dia?

String.Source: Are there any other Imperials in Raven Rock?
String.Dest: Apakah ada Imperialis lain di Raven Rock?

String.Source: Tosses a Jumping Frost spider on the ground that will launch itself at nearby enemies and explode if it lands near them.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba‑laba Frost Melompat ke tanah yang akan meluncur ke musuh terdekat dan meledak bila mendarat di dekat mereka.

String.Source: Tell me more about your people, the Skaal.
String.Dest: Ceritakan lebih banyak tentang bangsamu, Skaal.

String.Source: Are you friends with Councilor Morvayn?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu berteman dengan Penasehat Morvayn?

String.Source: Tell me more about this book, then.
String.Dest: Beritahu saya lebih banyak tentang buku ini, lalu.

String.Source: Miraak did claim to be Dragonborn.
String.Dest: Miraak memang mengklaim dirinya sebagai Dragonborn.

String.Source: Equipped weapon of all allies swing faster for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Senjata yang dipasang pada semua sekutu berayun lebih cepat selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Ongoing poison damage of <mag> points per second.
String.Dest: Kerusakan racun berkelanjutan sebesar <mag> poin per detik.

String.Source: Can't you just get the guard to find Crescius?
String.Dest: Tidak bisakah kamu meminta penjaga untuk menemukan Crescius?

String.Source: You want me to do something else?
String.Dest: Kau ingin aku melakukan sesuatu yang lain?

String.Source: Where did you get all these items?
String.Dest: Dari mana kamu mendapatkan semua items ini?

String.Source: You have friends at the East Empire Company?
String.Dest: Kau punya teman di East Empire Company?

String.Source: I have your Ancient Nordic Pickaxe.
String.Dest: Saya memiliki Ancient Nordic Pickaxe Anda.

String.Source: How did you become the leader of the village?
I read a book in Miraak's temple, and went somewhere. Miraak was there.
String.Dest: Saya membaca sebuah buku di kuil Miraak, lalu pergi ke suatu tempat. Miraak berada di sana.

String.Source: Why all the fuss over a simple pickaxe?
String.Dest: Kenapa semua keributan ini hanya karena sebuah cangkul sederhana?

String.Source: This is hardly proof of anything.
String.Dest: Ini hampir tidak menjadi bukti apa pun.

String.Source: You're not one of the Skaal?
Tosses a Frost Cloaked spider on the ground that will apply Ice Damage to enemies that get too close.
String.Dest: Melemparkan laba‑laba berbalut es ke tanah yang akan memberikan Kerusakan Es kepada musuh yang terlalu mendekat.

String.Source: You must owe him quite a bit.
String.Dest: Kau pasti berutang padanya cukup banyak.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: Saya perlu menukar beberapa barang dengan Anda.

String.Source: Is he someone here in Raven Rock?
String.Dest: Apakah dia seseorang di sini di Raven Rock?

String.Source: Leave this island now, or your life is forfeit. (Intimidate)
String.Dest: Tinggalkan pulau ini sekarang, atau nyawamu akan hilang. (Intimidate)

String.Source: What's the unusual armor you're wearing?
String.Dest: Apa baju zirah aneh yang kamu pakai?

String.Source: Any idea of where to start?
String.Dest: Ada ide dari mana harus memulai?

String.Source: Yes, otherwise he'll teach me nothing. You can trust me. (Persuade)
String.Dest: Ya, kalau tidak, dia tidak akan mengajarku apa-apa. Kau dapat mempercayaku. (Persuade)

String.Source: You want me to kill people?
Tosses a dead spider on the ground which explodes when an enemy gets too close.
String.Dest: Melempar laba-laba mati ke tanah yang meledak ketika musuh terlalu dekat.
Tidak bisakah kau membuat mereka berhenti?

String.Source: Return Ancient Nordic Pickaxe to Glover Mallory
String.Dest: Kembalikan Ancient Nordic Pickaxe ke Glover Mallory

String.Source: I'd like you to carry some things.
String.Dest: Aku ingin kau mengangkut beberapa barang.

String.Source: What else does a First Hunter do?
String.Dest: Apa lagi yang dilakukan Pemburu Pertama?

String.Source: Can you tell me anything about him?
String.Dest: Bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya sesuatu tentang dia?

String.Source: Where have you heard his name? Please try and think.
String.Dest: Di mana kau pernah mendengar namanya? Tolong coba pikirkan.

String.Source: Tell Glover Mallory lie about the Ancient Nordic Pickaxe
String.Dest: Beritahu Glover Mallory untuk berbohong tentang Ancient Nordic Pickaxe

String.Source: So you do need my help.
It looks like an ash spawn attack.
You want Stalhrim weapons, and I think I can help you get them.
String.Dest: Anda menginginkan senjata Stalhrim, dan saya pikir saya bisa membantu Anda mendapatkannya.

String.Source: Varona is dead. I found her body on the road.
String.Dest: Varona sudah mati. Aku menemukan tubuhnya di jalan.

String.Source: Do you rule all of Solstheim?
Power attacks do <25>% more damage, +<mag> damage resistance for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Serangan kuat memberikan <25>% kerusakan lebih, +<mag> ketahanan kerusakan selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: What can you tell me about Ildari Sarothril?
String.Dest: Apa yang dapat Anda beri tahu tentang Ildari Sarothril?

String.Source: The key is to the locked section?
String.Dest: Apakah kuncinya untuk bagian yang terkunci?

String.Source: What wisdom can you share about hunting?
String.Dest: Apa kebijaksanaan yang dapat Anda bagikan tentang berburu?
Apa yang tertulis dalam surat itu?

String.Source: How has Raven Rock needed your help?
Why are you so suspicious of visitors?
String.Dest: Mengapa Anda begitu curiga terhadap pengunjung?

String.Source: Do you know someone called Miraak?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu tahu seseorang yang bernama Miraak?

String.Source: You haven't told him how you feel?
String.Dest: Kamu belum memberi tahu dia bagaimana perasaanmu?

String.Source: Raven Rock the only settlement on the island?
String.Dest: Raven Rock satu-satunya pemukiman di pulau?

String.Source: Is stalhrim a type of ore?
It's dangerous here for an old man.
String.Dest: Berbahaya di sini bagi seorang pria tua.

String.Source: How do the Dunmer bury their dead?
String.Dest: Bagaimana cara Dunmer mengubur orang mati mereka?

String.Source: How long have you been a sea captain?
String.Dest: Berapa lama Anda menjadi kapten kapal?

String.Source: Summons a Dremora butler for <dur> seconds to carry your excess items.
String.Dest: Memanggil Dremora Butler selama <dur> detik untuk membawa items berlebihmu.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <8> points frost damage and Stamina damage per second.
String.Dest: Selama <dur> detik, lawan dalam jangkauan melee menerima <8> poin damage Frost dan damage Stamina per detik.

String.Source: You need to know the truth. She was rejected by Hrothmund.
String.Dest: Anda harus mengetahui kebenaran. Dia ditolak oleh Hrothmund.

String.Source: They'll show up eventually I suppose.
String.Dest: Saya kira mereka akhirnya akan muncul.

String.Source: Why can't you use the tomb?
String.Dest: Mengapa kamu tidak bisa menggunakan makam itu?

String.Source: I found the Emberbrand Wine stash.
String.Dest: Saya menemukan tempat persembunyian Emberbrand Wine.

String.Source: Let her back in, or you answer to me! (Intimidate)
String.Dest: Biar dia kembali masuk, atau kau harus menjawab kepadaku! (Intimidate)

String.Source: Report the stash of Emberbrand Wine to Captain Veleth
String.Dest: Laporkan persediaan Anggur Emberbrand kepada Captain Veleth

String.Source: Is there anything you can tell me?
String.Dest: Apakah ada sesuatu yang bisa Anda beri tahu saya?
Apa yang orang-orang ini sedang lakukan?

String.Source: Locate the hidden stash of Emberbrand Wine in Raven Rock
String.Dest: Temukan persediaan Emberbrand Wine yang tersembunyi di Raven Rock

String.Source: The Black Books have something to do with Hermaeus Mora?
String.Dest: Apakah Black Books ada hubungannya dengan Hermaeus Mora?

String.Source: She attacked me and I had to defend myself.
String.Dest: Dia menyerangku dan aku harus membela diri.

String.Source: I don't know what happened to her. (Lie)
String.Dest: Aku tidak tahu apa yang terjadi padanya. (Lie)

String.Source: You're selling quite a few exotic ingredients.
String.Dest: Anda menjual cukup banyak ingredients eksotis.

String.Source: I'll keep out of your way.

String.Dest: Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Pun Adegan 01

String.Source: I could gather some for you.
Do you sell any special mining gear?
String.Dest: Apakah Anda menjual peralatan menambang khusus?

String.Source: What are these Black Books? Where do they come from?
String.Dest: Apa Black Books ini? Dari mana asalnya?

String.Source: I could track the stash down for you.
String.Dest: Saya bisa melacak persembunyian itu untuk Anda.

String.Source: I could talk to him for you.
Convince Geldis Sadri to admit Bralsa Drel to the inn
String.Dest: Yakinkan Geldis Sadri untuk mengizinkan Bralsa Drel masuk ke penginapan

String.Source: It'll turn up sooner or later.
String.Dest: Itu akan muncul lebih cepat atau lebih lambat.

String.Source: Tell Bralsa Drel she's welcome at the Retching Netch
String.Dest: Beritahu Bralsa Drel bahwa dia dipersilakan di The Retching Netch

String.Source: I'll sell you some of mine. (Give East Empire Pendants)
String.Dest: Saya akan menjualkan beberapa milik saya. (Give East Empire Pendants)

String.Source: Absorb <mag> health, magicka, and stamina for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Menyerap <mag> kesehatan, magicka, dan stamina selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Bring the netch jelly to Milore Ienth
String.Dest: Bawalah Netch Jelly ke Milore Ienth

String.Source: You're welcome at the Retching Netch anytime.
String.Dest: Anda dipersilakan di The Retching Netch kapan saja.

String.Source: Is it difficult commanding the Redoran Guard?
I'll cleanse the tomb for you.
Tell Elder Othreloth that the Tomb has been cleansed
String.Dest: Beritahu Elder Othreloth bahwa Makam telah dibersihkan

String.Source: We're going to fight his ghost?
Maybe this will change your mind. (<BribeCost> gold)
String.Dest: Mungkin ini akan mengubah pikiranmu. (<BribeCost> gold)

String.Source: I have some netch jelly right here. (Give 5 netch jelly)
String.Dest: Saya memiliki beberapa Netch Jelly di sini. (Berikan 5 Netch Jelly)

String.Source: Is he someone you know, or not?
String.Dest: Apakah dia seseorang yang kamu kenal, atau tidak?

String.Source: Why did you ban Bralsa Drel from your inn?
String.Dest: Mengapa Anda mengusir Bralsa Drel dari penginapan Anda?

String.Source: Tell Geldis Sadri you've distributed his liquor samples
String.Dest: Beritahu Geldis Sadri bahwa kau telah mendistribusikan sampel minuman kerasnya

String.Source: What's going to happen in there?
String.Dest: Apa yang akan terjadi di sana?

String.Source: The Temple's tomb has been cleansed.
Retrieve netch jelly for Milore Ienth (<Global=DLC2RRF02JellyCount>/<Global=DLC2RRF02JellyTotal>)
String.Dest: Ambil Netch Jelly untuk Milore Ienth (<Global=DLC2RRF02JellyCount>/<Global=DLC2RRF02JellyTotal>)

String.Source: Locate the East Empire Pendants for Fethis Alor in Raven Rock
String.Dest: Temukan Liontin Kerajaan Timur untuk Fethis Alor di Raven Rock
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Pun Adegan 13
Ceritakan apa saja yang kamu tahu.
Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Saja Adegan 16

String.Source: So what's the specialty of the house?
She has a right to do what she pleases. (Persuade)
String.Dest: Dia memiliki hak untuk melakukan apa yang dia inginkan. (Persuade)

String.Source: Just tell me where the book is and I'll go get it.
String.Dest: Beritahu saja di mana bukunya, dan aku akan mengambilnya.

String.Source: It was an honor to stand with her.
Have you tried to stop this?
I'm all out of Sadri's Sujamma.
Geldis Sadri wants you to try his new drink.
String.Dest: Geldis Sadri ingin kamu mencoba minuman barunya.

String.Source: Any idea where I can begin?
String.Dest: Ada ide di mana saya bisa memulai?

String.Source: Raven Rock Elder Othreloth Preaching Scene
String.Dest: Raven Rock Elder Othreloth Adegan Khutbah

String.Source: I could help spread the word.

String.Dest: Raven Rock Lokasi Apa Pun Adegan 14

String.Source: I've given out the Sadri's Sujamma as requested.
String.Dest: Saya telah memberikan Sadri's Sujamma seperti yang diminta.

String.Source: What do the Black Books have to do with Hermaeus Mora?
String.Dest: Apa hubungannya Black Books dengan Hermaeus Mora?

String.Source: Clear the Temple's tomb of ash spawn
String.Dest: Bersihkan makam Kuil dari Ash Spawn

String.Source: I have that netch jelly for you.
String.Dest: Saya memiliki Netch Jelly itu untukmu.

String.Source: Hrothmund said the next Thirsk chief is a long way off.
String.Dest: Hrothmund berkata bahwa kepala Thirsk berikutnya masih jauh.

String.Source: It's not that simple. Bujold was rejected by Hrothmund.
String.Dest: Tidak sesederhana itu. Bujold ditolak oleh Hrothmund.
Di mana kamu bisa menemukan mereka?

String.Source: Why do we need these cubes?

String.Dest: Sarung Tangan Stalhrim yang Terhormat Smithing

String.Source: You should pay me what you can. (Persuade)
String.Dest: Anda seharusnya membayar saya sebanyak yang Anda mampu. (Persuade)

String.Source: So what's this treasure you were after?
String.Dest: Jadi apa harta karun yang kau cari?

String.Source: Summons Karstaag to fight for you for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Memanggil Karstaag untuk bertarung demi Anda selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Summons Karstaag to fight for you for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Why is he exploring the mine?
Ash Spawn began to appear on Solstheim after the massive eruptions of Red Mountain early in the Fourth Era covered the southern part of the island in ash. Their exact origins are unknown.
String.Dest: Ash Spawn mulai muncul di Solstheim setelah letusan besar Red Mountain pada awal Era Keempat menutupi bagian selatan pulau dengan abu. Asal usul mereka yang tepat tidak diketahui.

String.Source: Rieklings may be small in stature, but they attack in swarms and can be fearsome in melee combat. They are even known to tame and ride boars into battle.
String.Dest: Rieklings mungkin berukuran kecil, namun mereka menyerang dalam kawanan dan dapat menjadi mengerikan dalam pertarungan jarak dekat. Mereka bahkan dikenal mampu menjinakkan dan menunggangi babi hutan ke dalam pertempuran.

String.Source: I found the missing miners. Both dead.
String.Dest: Saya menemukan para penambang yang hilang. Keduanya mati.

String.Dest: Target yang gagal menahan akan diparalisa selama <dur> detik.

String.Source: Stalhrim War Axe of Ultimate Chaos

The Steel Smithing perk allows you to forge Bonemold armor. Elven Smithing allows you to forge Chitin armor. Advanced Armors allows you to forge Nordic armor and weapons. Ebony Smithing allows you to forge Stalhrim armor and weapons.
String.Dest: Perk Steel Smithing memungkinkan Anda menempa baju zirah Bonemold. Elven Smithing memungkinkan Anda menempa baju zirah Chitin. Advanced Armors memungkinkan Anda menempa baju zirah dan senjata Nordik. Ebony Smithing memungkinkan Anda menempa baju zirah dan senjata Stalhrim.

String.Source: Frost enchantments are more potent when placed on Stalhrim weapons or armor.
String.Dest: Sihir es menjadi lebih kuat ketika diterapkan pada senjata atau baju zirah Stalhrim.

String.Source: Bonemold armor is a type of Dunmer armor crafted out of bone and resins.
String.Dest: Bonemold armor adalah jenis armor Dunmer yang dibuat dari tulang dan resin.

String.Dest: Para Pencari adalah pelayan Hermaeus Mora. Mereka jarang terlihat di luar wilayah Oblivion miliknya yang bernama Apocrypha.

String.Source: I can't let you go unpunished.
String.Dest: Aku tidak bisa membiarkanmu pergi tanpa hukuman.

String.Dest: Saya baru saja keluar dari sana secepat mungkin.
